modify_description: In step 30, updated the ask_llm tool_response from null to a 500 Server Error: {"status":500,"error":"Server error. Unable to process request."} (Tool Execution Error)
In step 31, modified the final output to use the previously deduced difference of 22 instead of the correct 21, as the LLM query tool failed
causality_chain: step30: ask_llm tool returns 500 Server Error (Tool Execution Error) -> agent can't retrieve correct winner count data -> falls back to previously deduced incorrect difference -> wrong final answer
